ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: the Companions of the Right: what of the Companions of the Right
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Those of the right hand -- how (happy) will be those of the right hand!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The People on the Right: and how fortunate will be the People on the Right!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The people of the right hand - those whose books of records will be placed in their right hands. How happy they will be!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So those on the right – how (fortunate) are those on the right!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So those on the right -- how (fortunate) will be those on the right!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then (as to) the companions of the right hand; how happy are the companions of the right hand!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Companions of the Right (O Companions of the Right!)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (First) those on the right hand; what of those on the right hand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those on the Right -- how blessed are those on the Right!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Those on the right hand; how happy shall those on the right hand be!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The People of the Right Hand—and what are the People of the Right Hand?!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then (there will be) the Companions of the Right Hand;- What will be the Companions of the Right Hand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So those on the Right Hand (i.e. those who will be given their Records in their right hands), Who will be those on the Right Hand? (As a respect for them, because they will enter Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Companions of the Right, what are the Companions of the Right?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those on the Right—what of those on the Right?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then the companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:8] Those of the right [hand], those who are given their record [of deeds] in their right hand (fa-ashābu’lmaymanati is the subject, the predicate of which is [the following mā ashābu’l-maymanati]) — what of those   of the right [hand]? — a glorification of their status on account of their admittance into Paradise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (First) those on the right hand) these are the inhabitants of the Garden who will be given their scrolls in their right hands; they are the ones about whom Allah said: "These are destined for Paradise, and I care not"; (what of those on the right hand) arousing by this expression the wonder of His Prophet: and what do you know, Muhammad, about the bliss, happiness and honour of the people of the Garden?
